TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
It's just a cracker. What's wrong with that? *Chef, he's catching on to our Creatures in Soup initiative!*

Waiter, there's some gates with the name Bill on them. Is this a Microsoft advertisement?

No, promise.

Waiter, there's a battered sausage in my soup.

Yeah, we took all the butter out. Like a man.

Waiter, there's coffee in my soup!

Well, we aren't a Starbucks, now are we, Let me take that...

Waiter, there's a Walmart in my soup!

The descriptions on the menu: Great products, at lower prices.

Waiter, there's a Mediocre Youtuber that self advertises on other peoples videos because he has no life, no loving family, and had been divorced for 3 months in my soup!

I'm afraid your problem is out of our area of help. Please consult the NSA for more information.

Waiter, there's a pair of sunglasses in my soup!

That means it's cool enough to eat.

Waiter, there's a cube in my soup.

Are you sure it's not an ice...wait, why is there another cube connected to it? ...OMG THE 4TH DIMENSION REALLY EXISTS!!!!

Waiter, there's a HYPERCUBE in my soup!

Oh, if you let it touch the tip of the bowl, reality will be distorted and we'll all die. Just leave it alone.

Waiter, there's a reality TV show in my soup! Starring the new character, Crushinator Hypercube.

bah .... it's also digestive within the process

Waiter, there an omega pause due to a great alpha in my soup.

Greek! I'm not the waiter that brought you this soup!

Waiter, there's a thread necro in my soup.

You're absolutely right and the soup should be closed, just pay for a new one :^3

Waiter!!! There's a manual transmission in my soup! >:-[

Dammit, I got ninja'd...

We put it in your soup so you'd install it in your car. Better gas mileage and more controllability awaits.

Waiter, there's a chibi in my soup!

Don't worry, it's an Edgar chibi.

Edgar is the one in the soup.

Waiter, there's a J-2 engine in 9x symmetry in my soup!

Its to heat up the soup. (whispers)Well the CRIT agency was found

Waiter! There is poison in my soup!

You have 2.49 seconds to live.

Waiter, there's a headcrab in my soup!

Uhh...what is that? Just uh...RUN!

Waiter! There's a critical mass of plutonium in my soup!

So that's why my geiger counter was going off...

Waiter, there's a railgun in mys soup!

Looks like you got the skunk special.

Waiter! There's a stock cargo bay in my soup!

That's our hype soup.

Waiter! There's a star in my soup!

It helps you win the game, the chef said.

Waiter, there's a friggen steam locomotive in my DIESEL soup!

Oh, sorry, the chef thought you were asking for the Conversion Era soup.

Waiter, there's a laser in my so- *gets killed by laser*

Oh... So that's where my laser pistol was...

Waiter, there's a hydrogen bomb in my soup!

The latest Unreliable Hipster Self-Publishing Magazines say that radioactive isotopes are good for you. Also explosions.

Waiter! My soup is sugar-frosted!

Well, you did say "put some sugar on me"~

Waiter, there's Def Leppard in my soup!
